alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 11:48PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Carroll, Douglas and central Fulton Counties through 1215 AM EST... At 1148 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Brownsville to near the I-20 Welcome Center, and moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Atlanta, Douglasville, Carrollton, Villa Rica, Austell, Temple, Mount Zion, Lithia Springs, Grant Park-Zoo Atlanta, Sweet Auburn, Bill Arp, Fairplay, Abilene, Winston, Lake Val-Do-Mar, John Tanner State Park, Cascade Heights, Sandtown, Sweetwater Creek State Park and West End. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM EST for north central and northwestern Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Carroll; Douglas; North Fulton; South Fulton
